ai_sprite.name: seezoram
ai_sprite.dialog: Thank you for dealing with Nehor. He was mounting quite a rebellion in this city. I don't know where he fled to, but he had many followers in Ammonihah, to the south by the head of the river Sidon.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Seezorm is our lower chief judge, who rules over the city of Hearthom. He wishes to thank you for your aid.
